div.p: This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/pacio-splasch/CodeSystem/SPLASCHSwallowingObservationCS defines the following codes:

tr.td: What modified diet is recommended for the individual to swallow solids safely?
What modified liquid is recommended for the individual to swallow safely?
Nutrition and hydration diet delivered through non-oral means
What percentage of the individual's daily diet is delivered through non-oral means in order to maintain adequate nutrition and hydration?
Difficulties with oral containment or secretion management
How often does the individual exhibit difficulties with oral containment or secretion management?
Require assistance or supervision for swallowing safety

How often does the individual require supervision/assistance at meal time due to swallowing safety (e.g., risk of aspiration, pocketing)? Note: If individual is NPO, rate supervision/assistance as 91-100% of the time.

definition.value: What modified diet is recommended for the individual to swallow solids safely?
What modified liquid is recommended for the individual to swallow safely?

display.value: Nutrition and hydration diet delivered through non-oral means

definition.value: What percentage of the individual's daily diet is delivered through non-oral means in order to maintain adequate nutrition and hydration?

display.value: Difficulties with oral containment or secretion management

definition.value: How often does the individual exhibit difficulties with oral containment or secretion management?

display.value: Require assistance or supervision for swallowing safety

definition.value: How often does the individual require supervision/assistance at meal time due to swallowing safety (e.g., risk of aspiration, pocketing)? Note: If individual is NPO, rate supervision/assistance as 91-100% of the time.
